actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend sections 562 and 563 of the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 to provide for direct Federal payment to hospitals and emergency ambulance service providers of emergency medical care and certain emergency ambulance services for illegal immigrants.
short_title: Illegal Immigrant Emergency Care Reimbursement Improvement Act of 2002

summary.text: Illegal Immigrant Emergency Care Reimbursement Improvement Act of 2002 - Amends the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 to provide direct Federal payment for hospital emergency medical care and emergency ambulance services for illegal aliens.

titles.title: Illegal Immigrant Emergency Care Reimbursement Improvement Act of 2002

To amend sections 562 and 563 of the Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 to provide for direct Federal payment to hospitals and emergency ambulance service providers of emergency medical care and certain emergency ambulance services for illegal immigrants.
